channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Feorian
item.dc:creator: Feorian
item.description:
Pretty sure that repair guy has the second mortgage on my wow account.
Enough heroic mech to jade even the most drugged up player.
Exaulted with Sha'Tar = NEVER AGAIN.
But seriously? Who actually DOES the fire-bitch? Amirite?
item.content:encoded:
Pretty sure that repair guy has the second mortgage on my wow account.

Enough heroic mech to jade even the most drugged up player.

Exaulted with Sha’Tar = NEVER AGAIN.

But seriously? Who actually DOES the fire-bitch? Amirite?

item.title: By: Dajay
item.dc:creator: Dajay
item.description: Oh, well. Vision after am *expensive* Tempest Keep wipe.
item.content:encoded: Oh, well. Vision after am *expensive* Tempest Keep wipe.

item.title: By: Lassirra
item.dc:creator: Lassirra
item.description: Heh, yeah... pretty sure a lot of people are familiar with that place. I know I've grudgingly parted with many a gold piece there.
item.content:encoded: Heh, yeah… pretty sure a lot of people are familiar with that place. I know I’ve grudgingly parted with many a gold piece there.

item.title: By: blachawk
item.dc:creator: blachawk
item.description: Yeah, after farming motes of mana, I like to pop by there to pick up a free 100 honor or so killing afk horde by the flight master.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, after farming motes of mana, I like to pop by there to pick up a free 100 honor or so killing afk horde by the flight master.

item.title: By: Val
item.dc:creator: Val
item.description: Yeah, thats where you repair after the rogue insists on running to the tank while three elementals are chasing after him.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, thats where you repair after the rogue insists on running to the tank while three elementals are chasing after him.

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: @Foton - It's just because we've all run heroic mech a billion times, so it's easy to recognize the aerial view.
item.content:encoded: @Foton – It’s just because we’ve all run heroic mech a billion times, so it’s easy to recognize the aerial view.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Jeezus, I didn't even finish deleting spam before the first guess.
item.content:encoded: Jeezus, I didn’t even finish deleting spam before the first guess.

item.title: By: Zaphid
item.dc:creator: Zaphid
item.description: ahh, the home of a greedy repairman and even greedier reagent vendor
item.content:encoded: ahh, the home of a greedy repairman and even greedier reagent vendor
